title: Ground News - Investigation: Soldiers did not hear orders during accidental shooting of 3 hostages
text:
Summary by Arutz Sheva Chief of Staff concludes killing of 3 hostages by IDF forces could have been prevented, but soldiers acted according to their understanding. Share menu More
